opis: Apartmanski kompleks , Pomer , Istra ,ukupne stambena površine 500m2 koji se nalaze na parceli od 800m2. Objekt je izgraden 2000 godine i sastoji se od: ● dvije jedinstvene stambene jedinice od 130m2 svaka sa 2 apartmana od 65m2, jedan do drugog (ukupno 4 apartmana - 260m2) ○ svaka jedinica ima veliku terasu po cijeloj dužini kuće ○ svaki apartman se sastoji od kuhinje i dnevnog boravka, kupatila, spavace sobe i mansarde. ○ svi su apartmani namješteni i klimatizirani ● 1 apartman u prizemlju od 150m2 ○ sastoji se od velikog dnevnog boravka sa kaminom i stolom za 12 osoba, kupatilom, kuhinjom i 3 spavace sobe u izgradnji ● Vanjska kuhinja sa BBQ ● 4 vanjske terase ● 1 velika pokrivena terasa izmedju dva objekta od 100m2 ● Parkirno mjesto je osigurano za 5 automobila (3 gore i 2 dole) Slike apartmana nedostaju. Video nadzor pokriva cijelu jedinicu. Od mora je udaljen 300 m zračne linije. Idealna za obiteljski život kao i za bavljenje turizmom. Objekt se prodaje u paketu i kompletno namjesten. Za vise informacija geofly.immobilien@gmail.com, 095 829 1188 ENG Apartment complex, Pomer, Istria, total living area of ​​500m2 located on a plot of 800m2. The facility was built in 2000 and consists of: ● two unique residential units of 130m2 each with 2 apartments of 65m2, next to each other (total 4 apartments - 260m2) ○ Each unit has a large terrace along the entire length of the house ○ each apartment consists of a kitchen and living room, bathroom, bedroom and attic. ○ All apartments are furnished and air conditioned ● 1 apartment on the ground floor of 150m2 ○ consists of a large living room with fireplace and table for 12 people, bathroom, kitchen and 3 bedrooms under construction ● Outdoor kitchen with BBQ ● 4 outdoor terraces ● 1 large covered terrace between two buildings of 100m2 ● Parking space is provided for 5 cars (3 up and 2 down) Pictures of the apartment are missing. Video surveillance covers the entire unit. It is 300 m as the crow flies from the sea. Ideal for family life as well as for tourism. The facility is sold in a package and fully furnished.
